info.name: MCP Bridge API - Aisera Compatible
info.description:
HTTP bridge to Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers. Contains embedded function specifications for AI parsing.

Infrastructure Functions:
- health: Check API health status (no parameters)
- servers: Get all connected servers (no parameters)
- tools: Get tools for a server (parameters: serverId:string)

Mathematical Functions:
- add: Add two numbers (parameters: a:number, b:number)
- subtract: Subtract two numbers (parameters: a:number, b:number)
- multiply: Multiply two numbers (parameters: a:number, b:number)
- divide: Divide two numbers (parameters: a:number, b:number)
- power: Calculate power (parameters: base:number, exponent:number)
- square_root: Calculate square root (parameters: value:number)
- sin: Calculate sin (parameters: angle:number, unit:string)
- cos: Calculate cos (parameters: angle:number, unit:string)
- tan: Calculate tan (parameters: angle:number, unit:string)
- distance: Calculate distance (parameters: x1:number, y1:number, x2:number, y2:number)
- ln: Calculate natural log (parameters: value:number)
- exp: Calculate e^x (parameters: value:number)
- log: Calculate logarithm (parameters: value:number, base:number)
- factorial: Calculate factorial (parameters: value:integer)
- quadratic: Solve quadratic equation (parameters: a:number, b:number, c:number)
- mean: Calculate arithmetic mean (parameters: values:array)
- median: Calculate median (parameters: values:array)
- complex_add: Add complex numbers (parameters: a_real:number, a_imag:number, b_real:number, b_imag:number)

item.name: Infrastructure

request.description:
Check the health status of the MCP Bridge API

Returns:
- status: Overall status ("ok")
- uptime: Server uptime in seconds
- serverCount: Number of connected MCP servers
- servers: Array of connected server details

Function Spec:
```json
{
  "name": "health",
  "description": "Check MCP Bridge API health status",
  "parameters": {
    "type": "object",
    "properties": {},
    "required": []
  },
  "metadata": "Infrastructure endpoint - health monitoring"
}
```

Get list of all connected MCP servers

Returns:
- servers: Array of server objects with id, connected status, pid, etc.

Function Spec:
```json
{
  "name": "servers",
  "description": "Get list of all connected MCP servers",
  "parameters": {
    "type": "object",
    "properties": {},
    "required": []
  },
  "metadata": "Infrastructure endpoint - server discovery"
}
```

item.description: Infrastructure endpoints for MCP Bridge API management, server discovery, and health monitoring
